SRP.Q: In 1968, what is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the line representing Skyward Systems relative to Ironclad Industries?
SRP.A: In 1968, Skyward Systems is {below} Ironclad Industries in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: On Ironclad Industries, what is the spatial relationship of the data point in 1968 relative to that in 1983 in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: On Ironclad Industries, the data point in 1968 is {below} and to the {left} of the data point in 1983.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Meridian Dynamics's Cost per Hire levels?

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Skyward Systems's Cost per Hire levels?
